trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lorain
There were no other sightings in Lorain on or around July 31st 1994
divs: Sighting Detailsthe 2 of us were on a small power boat in mid-summer about 7 years ago. we wereabout one half mile off shore at approx. 10pm. the motor was not running, wewere listening to music when we saw the baseball size white sphere off the sternof the boat. it was about 5 feet above the water and it was blinking on and offmaking no noise. from what i reacll, it was moving slowly in a northwestdirection from the moment i first noticed it. it was no more than 10 feet away!it continued on a straight path blinking about every 1.5 seconds until wecouldnt see it anymore in the darkness. neither of us could explain it at thetime and cannot to this day.i recently saw a film clip of a VERY similar objectthat was filmed in the area of a crop formation in england.i would be veryinterested in finding out if anyone else (boaters, fisherman, etc.) has seen anylow flying balls over lake erie.i would be willing to talk to anyone interested.
